snippet: In two quiet Brooklyn neighborhoods, four men and 15 women were arrested and charged with running paid sexual services behind the doors of massage parlors and day spas.
abstract: New York City police officers arrest 4 men and 15 women on prostitution charges for running paid sexual services behind the doors of massage parlors and day spas in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: In two quiet Brooklyn neighborhoods, four men and 15 women were arrested and charged with running paid sexual services behind the doors of massage parlors and day spas.

headline.main: Prostitution Investigation at Day Spas Results in 19 Arrests
headline.print_headline: Prostitution Investigation at Day Spas Results in 19 Arrests
